detailed_profile.about: As a Talent Acquisition Specialist at Paytm, I leverage my experience in recruitment to attract and retain top talent for the company. I have a proven track record of successfully managing the full cycle of recruitment, from sourcing to onboarding, and ensuring a smooth transition for new hires. I also have strong skills in hiring practices which enables me to efficiently manage the recruitment process and maintain accurate records. My goal is to contribute to the growth and success of Paytm by finding the best candidates for the company's needs.

recommendations: Jaya Pal ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Shruti during her time at Talent Toppers and I can confidently say that she is one of the most talented recruiters I‚Äôve ever worked with. Shruti has a knack for turning challenging situations into opportunities, fostering a positive team atmosphere and delivering high-quality work on tight deadlines. Her skills in talent sourcing are top-notch. One of the things that sets Shruti apart is her ability to build strong relationships with candidates. Beyond her expertise, Shruti is a pleasure to work with‚Äîalways professional, organized, and approachable. She manages the entire recruitment process with ease and precision, ensuring both efficiency and quality. I would highly recommend Shruti to any organization looking for a recruiter who is not only a strong talent acquisition professional but also a strategic partner in building a high-performing team.‚Äù

Shalini Chamoli ‚Äú I am delighted to recommend Shruti, who was an exceptional recruiter in my team. Her dynamic nature and outstanding work commitment were instrumental in our team's success. Shruti consistently demonstrated an impressive ability to tackle complex recruitment challenges with a strategic and innovative approach. Her proactive attitude and meticulous attention to detail allowed her to efficiently manage multiple recruitment processes simultaneously, always delivering high-quality results. Shruti's exceptional interpersonal skills enabled her to build strong relationships with candidates, ensuring a seamless and positive recruitment experience. Beyond her technical expertise, Shruti's unwavering dedication and enthusiasm significantly boosted team morale and fostered a collaborative work environment. Her capacity to adapt to changing priorities and her keen problem-solving skills made her a go-to resource for both her colleagues and clients. In summary, Shruti's exceptional skills, dedication, and positive attitude make her a valuable asset to any organization. I am confident that she will continue to excel and make significant contributions wherever she goes.‚Äù

positions.subtitle: HuntingCube Recruitment Solutions
positions.description: - Hiring for Junior to senior level Tech positions like- Backend, SDET, QA, frontend, Android, iOS Developers, Product Manager, Engineering Lead, EM, SEM, DOE. - Attracting new candidates via networking, internal candidate's profiles. - Profiles Screening, Initial telephonic Screening, Scheduling interviews, Coordination and followup till Joining. -Account/Client handling & Guiding freshers. -Manage and maintain candidate's database after running a complete process of validation of their tech stack, knowledge, qualification and experience. -Coordinate with candidates for interviews and post-interview followups. -Follow up with the candidates to ensure acceptance of offers. -Job posting & Mass mailing through various sources (Paid & Unpaid sources).

recommendations: Jaya Pal ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Shruti during her time at Talent Toppers and I can confidently say that she is one of the most talented recruiters I‚Äôve ever worked with. Shruti has a knack for turning challenging situations into opportunities, fostering a positive team atmosphere and delivering high-quality work on tight deadlines. Her skills in talent sourcing are top-notch. One of the things that sets Shruti apart is her ability to build strong relationships with candidates. Beyond her expertise, Shruti is a pleasure to work with‚Äîalways professional, organized, and approachable. She manages the entire recruitment process with ease and precision, ensuring both efficiency and quality. I would highly recommend Shruti to any organization looking for a recruiter who is not only a strong talent acquisition professional but also a strategic partner in building a high-performing team.‚Äù

Shalini Chamoli ‚Äú I am delighted to recommend Shruti, who was an exceptional recruiter in my team. Her dynamic nature and outstanding work commitment were instrumental in our team's success. Her proactive attitude and meticulous attention to detail allowed her to efficiently manage multiple recruitment processes simultaneously, always delivering high-quality results. Shruti's exceptional interpersonal skills enabled her to build strong relationships with candidates, ensuring a seamless and positive recruitment experience. Beyond her technical expertise, Shruti's unwavering dedication and enthusiasm significantly boosted team morale and fostered a collaborative work environment. Her capacity to adapt to changing priorities and her keen problem-solving skills made her a go-to resource for both her colleagues and clients. In summary, Shruti's exceptional skills, dedication, and positive attitude make her a valuable asset to any organization. I am confident that she will continue to excel and make significant contributions wherever she goes.‚Äù

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

detailed_profile.name: Shilpa Aggarwal
detailed_profile.position: Senior Technical Lead at Paytm | C++ Developer | GCP Certified
detailed_profile.about: Hi, I am a passionate coder. Most of my experience is building highly scalable and low latency applications using C++, and I am currently leading the development team of Paytm EDC Linux machines. I have experience in single-handedly handling projects that include: Requirement gathering and analysis, providing estimates to business, Design, Development, coordination with testing teams, and shipping of web & windows applications. I have extensive experience working directly with clients. I am skilled in advanced C++ programming, including multi-threading, OpenSSL, Socket Programming, C++ Standard Template Library, Algorithms, and Design Patterns. experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

experience.title: Senior Key Account Manager
experience.description:
As a Key Account Manager (KAM) at Paytm, I focus on driving business growth by managing and strengthening relationships with key clients and partners. My role involves:


‚úÖ Strategic Account Management ‚Äì Handling high-value accounts, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maximizing revenue opportunities.

‚úÖ Business Development ‚Äì Identifying new business prospects, upselling Paytm‚Äôs solutions, and expanding market presence.

‚úÖ Client Relationship Management ‚Äì Acting as a trusted advisor, addressing client needs, and ensuring long-term partnerships.

‚úÖ Sales & Revenue Growth ‚Äì Driving transactions, negotiating deals, and achieving business targets.

‚úÖ Market & Competitor Analysis ‚Äì Staying ahead of trends to offer innovative fintech solutions.


At Paytm, I am committed to enhancing digital payment adoption and delivering seamless financial solutions to businesses.


#KeyAccountManager #Paytm #Sales #BusinessGrowth #Fintech #ClientSuccess
experience.description_html:
As a Key Account Manager (KAM) at Paytm, I focus on driving business growth by managing and strengthening relationships with key clients and partners. My role involves:

✅ Strategic Account Management – Handling high-value accounts, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maximizing revenue opportunities.
✅ Business Development – Identifying new business prospects, upselling Paytm’s solutions, and expanding market presence.
✅ Client Relationship Management – Acting as a trusted advisor, addressing client needs, and ensuring long-term partnerships.
✅ Sales & Revenue Growth – Driving transactions, negotiating deals, and achieving business targets.
✅ Market & Competitor Analysis – Staying ahead of trends to offer innovative fintech solutions.

At Paytm, I am committed to enhancing digital payment adoption and delivering seamless financial solutions to businesses.

#KeyAccountManager #Paytm #Sales #BusinessGrowth #Fintech #ClientSuccess

detailed_profile.name: Shilpa Aggarwal
detailed_profile.position: Senior Technical Lead at Paytm | C++ Developer | GCP Certified
detailed_profile.about: Hi, I am a passionate coder. Most of my experience is building highly scalable and low latency applications using C++, and I am currently leading the development team of Paytm EDC Linux machines. I have experience in single-handedly handling projects that include: Requirement gathering and analysis, providing estimates to business, Design, Development, coordination with testing teams, and shipping of web & windows applications. I have extensive experience working directly with clients. I am skilled in advanced C++ programming, including multi-threading, OpenSSL, Socket Programming, C++ Standard Template Library, Algorithms, and Design Patterns. Domains that I have had a chance to work on: 1. Automotive - Worked for BMW and Audi car Navigation Embedded Systems 2. Finance - Trading Exchange and Payments 3. Payments - paytm linux EDC device and paytm soundbox Accomplishments: I contributed to writing White Paper on the "negative interest rates" for Chicago Merchantile Exchange. Designed and implemented the end-to-end workflow of OTC FX Clearing Services for Chicago Merchantile Exchange while working in Maven Wave. https://www.financemagnates.com/institutional-forex/exchanges/cme-group-gets-green-light-offer-otc-fx-clearing-services/

detailed_profile.about: Hi, I am a passionate coder. Most of my experience is building highly scalable and low latency applications using C++, and I am currently leading the development team of Paytm EDC Linux machines. I have experience in single-handedly handling projects that include: Requirement gathering and analysis, providing estimates to business, Design, Development, coordination with testing teams, and shipping of web & windows applications. I have extensive experience working directly with clients. I am skilled in advanced C++ programming, including multi-threading, OpenSSL, Socket Programming, C++ Standard Template Library, Algorithms, and Design Patterns. Domains that I have had a chance to work on: 1. Automotive - Worked for BMW and Audi car Navigation Embedded Systems 2. Finance - Trading Exchange and Payments 3. Payments - paytm linux EDC device and paytm soundbox Accomplishments: I contributed to writing White Paper on the "negative interest rates" for Chicago Merchantile Exchange. Designed and implemented the end-to-end workflow of OTC FX Clearing Services for Chicago Merchantile Exchange while working in Maven Wave. https://www.financemagnates.com/institutional-forex/exchanges/cme-group-gets-green-light-offer-otc-fx-clearing-services/

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.
experience.description_html:
Key Responsibilities

Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas
Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis
Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern
Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis
Preparing auditing reports for other departments
Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA
Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time

Key Deliverables

Merchandising
Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time
Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.

Relationship Management
Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.
Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.

Significant Highlights:
Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth
Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Building Enterprise Partnership channel to drive the GMV/Sales/MTUs of various fintech products at Paytm Online Payments business Including hiring of team, Defining the structure , process, defining the product roadmap wrt to onboarding, the activation and also designed revenue model. ‚Ä¢Build and nurtured strategic partnerships to drive sales and increase transacting merchants for various payments products of Paytm Payments. ‚Ä¢ Collaborated with cross functional teams including Product, Activation, and Risk to develop a comprehensive cross-sell and up-sell channel/strategy for Paytm product suite. .Contributed to the development of marketing materials and sales collateral to support cross-selling efforts. ‚Ä¢Established strong partnerships with platform providers, Aggregators, ERPs, SAAS, companies to expand distribution channels and also Driving Strong relationship/partnership with Players like Shopify, Zoho, Google,Facebook,whatapp Salesforce, Freshworks, SAP, Tally, Woo commerce, Shopify to create a channel for sales ‚Ä¢ Executed campaigns with Partners to drive MTUs and monitor retention and churn rates. ‚Ä¢ Explored new industries and segments to identify strategic partnership opportunities at an organisational level.
positions.title: Head of Channel Partnerships/GM-Enterprise Business-Paytm Payments Services Limited
positions.description_html:
• Building Enterprise Partnership channel to drive the GMV/Sales/MTUs of various fintech products at Paytm Online Payments business Including hiring of team, Defining the structure , process, defining the product roadmap wrt to onboarding, the activation and also designed revenue model.
•Build and nurtured strategic partnerships to drive sales and increase transacting merchants for various payments products of Paytm Payments.
• Collaborated with cross functional teams including Product, Activation, and Risk to develop a comprehensive cross-sell and up-sell channel/strategy for Paytm product suite.
.Contributed to the development of marketing materials and sales collateral to support cross-selling efforts.
•Established strong partnerships with platform providers, Aggregators, ERPs, SAAS, companies to expand distribution channels and also Driving Strong relationship/partnership with Players like Shopify, Zoho, Google,Facebook,whatapp Salesforce, Freshworks, SAP, Tally, Woo commerce, Shopify to create a channel for sales
• Executed campaigns with Partners to drive MTUs and monitor retention and churn rates.
• Explored new industries and segments to identify strategic partnership opportunities at an organisational level.

experience.title: Senior Key Account Manager
experience.description:
As a Key Account Manager (KAM) at Paytm, I focus on driving business growth by managing and strengthening relationships with key clients and partners. My role involves:


‚úÖ Strategic Account Management ‚Äì Handling high-value accounts, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maximizing revenue opportunities.

‚úÖ Business Development ‚Äì Identifying new business prospects, upselling Paytm‚Äôs solutions, and expanding market presence.

‚úÖ Client Relationship Management ‚Äì Acting as a trusted advisor, addressing client needs, and ensuring long-term partnerships.

‚úÖ Sales & Revenue Growth ‚Äì Driving transactions, negotiating deals, and achieving business targets.

‚úÖ Market & Competitor Analysis ‚Äì Staying ahead of trends to offer innovative fintech solutions.


At Paytm, I am committed to enhancing digital payment adoption and delivering seamless financial solutions to businesses.


#KeyAccountManager #Paytm #Sales #BusinessGrowth #Fintech #ClientSuccess
experience.description_html:
As a Key Account Manager (KAM) at Paytm, I focus on driving business growth by managing and strengthening relationships with key clients and partners. My role involves:

✅ Strategic Account Management – Handling high-value accounts, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maximizing revenue opportunities.

positions.subtitle: Paytm
positions.description: currently I am working combinely in both Ra Automation project ( which create data from input raw data for different verticals of paytm like travel,recharges,upi etc and after converting send them in more structured and convenient form to SAP team through SFTP which then create invoices for all the merchants of different verticals) and Rapid Project ( in which we are reconciling both the bank data and paytm data on daily basis, this data is related to daily transactions done by users of paytm, on daily basis we are settling over 10 crores of transaction) Along with this, Also handling third project OneSapCode ( here we recieve merchantdata through kafka from different team and as per the input we create a single sap code for the merchants of paytm, this sap code plays an important role in invoicing action as this is the unique identifier of merchant, Invoices of each merchants are being generated on sap code basis)

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Building Enterprise Partnership channel to drive the GMV/Sales/MTUs of various fintech products at Paytm Online Payments business Including hiring of team, Defining the structure , process, defining the product roadmap wrt to onboarding, the activation and also designed revenue model. ‚Ä¢Build and nurtured strategic partnerships to drive sales and increase transacting merchants for various payments products of Paytm Payments. ‚Ä¢ Collaborated with cross functional teams including Product, Activation, and Risk to develop a comprehensive cross-sell and up-sell channel/strategy for Paytm product suite. .Contributed to the development of marketing materials and sales collateral to support cross-selling efforts. ‚Ä¢Established strong partnerships with platform providers, Aggregators, ERPs, SAAS, companies to expand distribution channels and also Driving Strong relationship/partnership with Players like Shopify, Zoho, Google,Facebook,whatapp Salesforce, Freshworks, SAP, Tally, Woo commerce, Shopify to create a channel for sales ‚Ä¢ Executed campaigns with Partners to drive MTUs and monitor retention and churn rates. ‚Ä¢ Explored new industries and segments to identify strategic partnership opportunities at an organisational level.
positions.title: Head of Channel Partnerships/GM-Enterprise Business-Paytm Payments Services Limited
positions.description_html:
• Building Enterprise Partnership channel to drive the GMV/Sales/MTUs of various fintech products at Paytm Online Payments business Including hiring of team, Defining the structure , process, defining the product roadmap wrt to onboarding, the activation and also designed revenue model.
•Build and nurtured strategic partnerships to drive sales and increase transacting merchants for various payments products of Paytm Payments.
• Collaborated with cross functional teams including Product, Activation, and Risk to develop a comprehensive cross-sell and up-sell channel/strategy for Paytm product suite.
.Contributed to the development of marketing materials and sales collateral to support cross-selling efforts.
•Established strong partnerships with platform providers, Aggregators, ERPs, SAAS, companies to expand distribution channels and also Driving Strong relationship/partnership with Players like Shopify, Zoho, Google,Facebook,whatapp Salesforce, Freshworks, SAP, Tally, Woo commerce, Shopify to create a channel for sales
• Executed campaigns with Partners to drive MTUs and monitor retention and churn rates.
• Explored new industries and segments to identify strategic partnership opportunities at an organisational level.

- Seting up manufacturing hubs that drives company's major topline

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

positions.title: Head of Channel Partnerships/GM-Enterprise Business-Paytm Payments Services Limited
positions.description_html:
• Building Enterprise Partnership channel to drive the GMV/Sales/MTUs of various fintech products at Paytm Online Payments business Including hiring of team, Defining the structure , process, defining the product roadmap wrt to onboarding, the activation and also designed revenue model.

• Executed campaigns with Partners to drive MTUs and monitor retention and churn rates.
• Explored new industries and segments to identify strategic partnership opportunities at an organisational level.

- Drive the largest sub-category across Apparel which contributes approximately to 50% of total Apparel Business

- Part of the central marketplace team responsible for building and strengthening the cross category business

- Seting up manufacturing hubs that drives company's major topline

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

recommendations: Jaya Pal ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Shruti during her time at Talent Toppers and I can confidently say that she is one of the most talented recruiters I‚Äôve ever worked with. Shruti has a knack for turning challenging situations into opportunities, fostering a positive team atmosphere and delivering high-quality work on tight deadlines. Her skills in talent sourcing are top-notch. One of the things that sets Shruti apart is her ability to build strong relationships with candidates. Beyond her expertise, Shruti is a pleasure to work with‚Äîalways professional, organized, and approachable. She manages the entire recruitment process with ease and precision, ensuring both efficiency and quality. I would highly recommend Shruti to any organization looking for a recruiter who is not only a strong talent acquisition professional but also a strategic partner in building a high-performing team.‚Äù

Shalini Chamoli ‚Äú I am delighted to recommend Shruti, who was an exceptional recruiter in my team. Her dynamic nature and outstanding work commitment were instrumental in our team's success. Shruti consistently demonstrated an impressive ability to tackle complex recruitment challenges with a strategic and innovative approach. Her proactive attitude and meticulous attention to detail allowed her to efficiently manage multiple recruitment processes simultaneously, always delivering high-quality results. Shruti's exceptional interpersonal skills enabled her to build strong relationships with candidates, ensuring a seamless and positive recruitment experience. Beyond her technical expertise, Shruti's unwavering dedication and enthusiasm significantly boosted team morale and fostered a collaborative work environment. Her capacity to adapt to changing priorities and her keen problem-solving skills made her a go-to resource for both her colleagues and clients. In summary, Shruti's exceptional skills, dedication, and positive attitude make her a valuable asset to any organization. I am confident that she will continue to excel and make significant contributions wherever she goes.‚Äù

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

recommendations: Jaya Pal ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Shruti during her time at Talent Toppers and I can confidently say that she is one of the most talented recruiters I‚Äôve ever worked with. Shruti has a knack for turning challenging situations into opportunities, fostering a positive team atmosphere and delivering high-quality work on tight deadlines. Her skills in talent sourcing are top-notch. One of the things that sets Shruti apart is her ability to build strong relationships with candidates. Beyond her expertise, Shruti is a pleasure to work with‚Äîalways professional, organized, and approachable. She manages the entire recruitment process with ease and precision, ensuring both efficiency and quality. I would highly recommend Shruti to any organization looking for a recruiter who is not only a strong talent acquisition professional but also a strategic partner in building a high-performing team.‚Äù

Shalini Chamoli ‚Äú I am delighted to recommend Shruti, who was an exceptional recruiter in my team. Her dynamic nature and outstanding work commitment were instrumental in our team's success. Shruti consistently demonstrated an impressive ability to tackle complex recruitment challenges with a strategic and innovative approach. Her proactive attitude and meticulous attention to detail allowed her to efficiently manage multiple recruitment processes simultaneously, always delivering high-quality results. Shruti's exceptional interpersonal skills enabled her to build strong relationships with candidates, ensuring a seamless and positive recruitment experience. Beyond her technical expertise, Shruti's unwavering dedication and enthusiasm significantly boosted team morale and fostered a collaborative work environment. Her capacity to adapt to changing priorities and her keen problem-solving skills made her a go-to resource for both her colleagues and clients. In summary, Shruti's exceptional skills, dedication, and positive attitude make her a valuable asset to any organization. I am confident that she will continue to excel and make significant contributions wherever she goes.‚Äù

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

experience.description_html:
As a Key Account Manager (KAM) at Paytm, I focus on driving business growth by managing and strengthening relationships with key clients and partners. My role involves:

✅ Strategic Account Management – Handling high-value accounts, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maximizing revenue opportunities.
✅ Business Development – Identifying new business prospects, upselling Paytm’s solutions, and expanding market presence.
✅ Client Relationship Management – Acting as a trusted advisor, addressing client needs, and ensuring long-term partnerships.

✅ Market & Competitor Analysis – Staying ahead of trends to offer innovative fintech solutions.

At Paytm, I am committed to enhancing digital payment adoption and delivering seamless financial solutions to businesses.

detailed_profile.about: Hi, I am a passionate coder. Most of my experience is building highly scalable and low latency applications using C++, and I am currently leading the development team of Paytm EDC Linux machines. I have experience in single-handedly handling projects that include: Requirement gathering and analysis, providing estimates to business, Design, Development, coordination with testing teams, and shipping of web & windows applications. I have extensive experience working directly with clients. I am skilled in advanced C++ programming, including multi-threading, OpenSSL, Socket Programming, C++ Standard Template Library, Algorithms, and Design Patterns. Domains that I have had a chance to work on: 1. Automotive - Worked for BMW and Audi car Navigation Embedded Systems 2. Finance - Trading Exchange and Payments 3. Payments - paytm linux EDC device and paytm soundbox Accomplishments: I contributed to writing White Paper on the "negative interest rates" for Chicago Merchantile Exchange. experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

experience.title: Senior Key Account Manager
experience.description:
As a Key Account Manager (KAM) at Paytm, I focus on driving business growth by managing and strengthening relationships with key clients and partners. My role involves:


‚úÖ Strategic Account Management ‚Äì Handling high-value accounts, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maximizing revenue opportunities.

‚úÖ Business Development ‚Äì Identifying new business prospects, upselling Paytm‚Äôs solutions, and expanding market presence.

‚úÖ Client Relationship Management ‚Äì Acting as a trusted advisor, addressing client needs, and ensuring long-term partnerships.

‚úÖ Sales & Revenue Growth ‚Äì Driving transactions, negotiating deals, and achieving business targets.

‚úÖ Market & Competitor Analysis ‚Äì Staying ahead of trends to offer innovative fintech solutions.


At Paytm, I am committed to enhancing digital payment adoption and delivering seamless financial solutions to businesses.


#KeyAccountManager #Paytm #Sales #BusinessGrowth #Fintech #ClientSuccess
experience.description_html:
As a Key Account Manager (KAM) at Paytm, I focus on driving business growth by managing and strengthening relationships with key clients and partners. My role involves:

✅ Strategic Account Management – Handling high-value accounts, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maximizing revenue opportunities.
✅ Business Development – Identifying new business prospects, upselling Paytm’s solutions, and expanding market presence.
✅ Client Relationship Management – Acting as a trusted advisor, addressing client needs, and ensuring long-term partnerships.
✅ Sales & Revenue Growth – Driving transactions, negotiating deals, and achieving business targets.
✅ Market & Competitor Analysis – Staying ahead of trends to offer innovative fintech solutions.

At Paytm, I am committed to enhancing digital payment adoption and delivering seamless financial solutions to businesses.

#KeyAccountManager #Paytm #Sales #BusinessGrowth #Fintech #ClientSuccess

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

‚úÖ Strategic Account Management ‚Äì Handling high-value accounts, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maximizing revenue opportunities.

‚úÖ Business Development ‚Äì Identifying new business prospects, upselling Paytm‚Äôs solutions, and expanding market presence.

‚úÖ Client Relationship Management ‚Äì Acting as a trusted advisor, addressing client needs, and ensuring long-term partnerships.

‚úÖ Sales & Revenue Growth ‚Äì Driving transactions, negotiating deals, and achieving business targets.

‚úÖ Market & Competitor Analysis ‚Äì Staying ahead of trends to offer innovative fintech solutions.


At Paytm, I am committed to enhancing digital payment adoption and delivering seamless financial solutions to businesses.


#KeyAccountManager #Paytm #Sales #BusinessGrowth #Fintech #ClientSuccess
experience.description_html:
As a Key Account Manager (KAM) at Paytm, I focus on driving business growth by managing and strengthening relationships with key clients and partners. My role involves:

✅ Strategic Account Management – Handling high-value accounts, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maximizing revenue opportunities.
✅ Business Development – Identifying new business prospects, upselling Paytm’s solutions, and expanding market presence.
✅ Client Relationship Management – Acting as a trusted advisor, addressing client needs, and ensuring long-term partnerships.
✅ Sales & Revenue Growth – Driving transactions, negotiating deals, and achieving business targets.
✅ Market & Competitor Analysis – Staying ahead of trends to offer innovative fintech solutions.

At Paytm, I am committed to enhancing digital payment adoption and delivering seamless financial solutions to businesses.

#KeyAccountManager #Paytm #Sales #BusinessGrowth #Fintech #ClientSuccess

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

Shruti's exceptional interpersonal skills enabled her to build strong relationships with candidates, ensuring a seamless and positive recruitment experience. Beyond her technical expertise, Shruti's unwavering dedication and enthusiasm significantly boosted team morale and fostered a collaborative work environment. Her capacity to adapt to changing priorities and her keen problem-solving skills made her a go-to resource for both her colleagues and clients. In summary, Shruti's exceptional skills, dedication, and positive attitude make her a valuable asset to any organization. detailed_profile.about: At RS Automation Pune, my role as Business Development Manager involves identifying new business avenues and forging strong client connections. With my MBA from Symbiosis International University, I bring a strategic blend of academic knowledge and practical expertise to drive sales and meet targets effectively. My background in event planning and digital marketing has honed my project management skills, enabling me to contribute to our team's success in expanding the market footprint and enhancing client satisfaction.

experience.title: Senior Key Account Manager
experience.description:
As a Key Account Manager (KAM) at Paytm, I focus on driving business growth by managing and strengthening relationships with key clients and partners. My role involves:


‚úÖ Strategic Account Management ‚Äì Handling high-value accounts, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maximizing revenue opportunities.

‚úÖ Business Development ‚Äì Identifying new business prospects, upselling Paytm‚Äôs solutions, and expanding market presence.

‚úÖ Client Relationship Management ‚Äì Acting as a trusted advisor, addressing client needs, and ensuring long-term partnerships.

‚úÖ Sales & Revenue Growth ‚Äì Driving transactions, negotiating deals, and achieving business targets.

‚úÖ Market & Competitor Analysis ‚Äì Staying ahead of trends to offer innovative fintech solutions.


At Paytm, I am committed to enhancing digital payment adoption and delivering seamless financial solutions to businesses.


#KeyAccountManager #Paytm #Sales #BusinessGrowth #Fintech #ClientSuccess
experience.description_html:
As a Key Account Manager (KAM) at Paytm, I focus on driving business growth by managing and strengthening relationships with key clients and partners. My role involves:

✅ Strategic Account Management – Handling high-value accounts, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maximizing revenue opportunities.
✅ Business Development – Identifying new business prospects, upselling Paytm’s solutions, and expanding market presence.
✅ Client Relationship Management – Acting as a trusted advisor, addressing client needs, and ensuring long-term partnerships.
✅ Sales & Revenue Growth – Driving transactions, negotiating deals, and achieving business targets.
✅ Market & Competitor Analysis – Staying ahead of trends to offer innovative fintech solutions.

At Paytm, I am committed to enhancing digital payment adoption and delivering seamless financial solutions to businesses.

#KeyAccountManager #Paytm #Sales #BusinessGrowth #Fintech #ClientSuccess

recommendations: Vijay Inani ‚ÄúI had the privilege of working under Deependra's leadership, and I can confidently say that he is one of the most impactful and charismatic leaders I've ever encountered. Deependra is not just hardworking; he thrives under pressure, effortlessly navigating the most challenging situations with poise and energy. What truly sets him apart is his unwavering commitment to his team. He always made himself available whenever support was needed, taking complete ownership of projects and shielding his people from unnecessary pressures. I was fortunate to have earned his trust, as he gave me complete authority in my role while providing full support at every step. This level of empowerment and trust was something I will always cherish. Deependra possesses a remarkable ability to provide solutions to complex problems, backed by his strong understanding of both Product and Technology. His deep technical knowledge, combined with his hands-on experience, allows him to tackle challenges from multiple angles and deliver effective solutions. He has risen from the ground up, which gives him a unique perspective and makes him an even more empathetic and grounded leader. Deependra's ability to make bold and tough decisions, often under immense pressure, has earned him deep respect across the organization. He maintains a strong and positive rapport with all stakeholders, ensuring alignment and mutual respect in every interaction. His leadership style is both impactful and inspirational, fostering an environment where learning and growth are inevitable. I have learned an incredible amount from Deependra, both professionally and personally. His guidance has been invaluable, and I will always be grateful for the opportunity to work with such an exceptional leader.‚Äù

LinkedIn User ‚ÄúI have worked with Deependra for short period of two months at Paytm. Although it was short, we were working hard on one of the critical projects of the organization which required stretched working hours and busy weekends as well. I must say he is a good leader and works well with the team in planning, designing, and execution of plans. He has sound knowledge of scalability, fault-tolerance, security and other aspects of systems. He always remains calm even, in the harsh conditions, and this character of his brings must needed sanity and positivity in the team. He is a workaholic and always open to having constructive discussions. I strongly recommend him to any organization who is looking for strong technology leader in their company. ‚Äù

positions.subtitle: Paytm
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Building Enterprise Partnership channel to drive the GMV/Sales/MTUs of various fintech products at Paytm Online Payments business Including hiring of team, Defining the structure , process, defining the product roadmap wrt to onboarding, the activation and also designed revenue model. ‚Ä¢Build and nurtured strategic partnerships to drive sales and increase transacting merchants for various payments products of Paytm Payments. ‚Ä¢ Collaborated with cross functional teams including Product, Activation, and Risk to develop a comprehensive cross-sell and up-sell channel/strategy for Paytm product suite. .Contributed to the development of marketing materials and sales collateral to support cross-selling efforts. ‚Ä¢Established strong partnerships with platform providers, Aggregators, ERPs, SAAS, companies to expand distribution channels and also Driving Strong relationship/partnership with Players like Shopify, Zoho, Google,Facebook,whatapp Salesforce, Freshworks, SAP, Tally, Woo commerce, Shopify to create a channel for sales ‚Ä¢ Executed campaigns with Partners to drive MTUs and monitor retention and churn rates. ‚Ä¢ Explored new industries and segments to identify strategic partnership opportunities at an organisational level.
positions.title: Head of Channel Partnerships/GM-Enterprise Business-Paytm Payments Services Limited
positions.description_html:
• Building Enterprise Partnership channel to drive the GMV/Sales/MTUs of various fintech products at Paytm Online Payments business Including hiring of team, Defining the structure , process, defining the product roadmap wrt to onboarding, the activation and also designed revenue model.
•Build and nurtured strategic partnerships to drive sales and increase transacting merchants for various payments products of Paytm Payments.
• Collaborated with cross functional teams including Product, Activation, and Risk to develop a comprehensive cross-sell and up-sell channel/strategy for Paytm product suite.
.Contributed to the development of marketing materials and sales collateral to support cross-selling efforts.
•Established strong partnerships with platform providers, Aggregators, ERPs, SAAS, companies to expand distribution channels and also Driving Strong relationship/partnership with Players like Shopify, Zoho, Google,Facebook,whatapp Salesforce, Freshworks, SAP, Tally, Woo commerce, Shopify to create a channel for sales
• Executed campaigns with Partners to drive MTUs and monitor retention and churn rates.
• Explored new industries and segments to identify strategic partnership opportunities at an organisational level.

experience.title: Category Manager
experience.description:
-Responsible for building and managing P&L for Men Apparel category

- Drive the largest sub-category across Apparel which contributes approximately to 50% of total Apparel Business

- Part of the central marketplace team responsible for building and strengthening the cross category business

- Drive the omni channel business set up for Apparel category at various level for PAN India

- Coordination and negotiations with all major Apparel Brands to deliver sales and margin plan

- Negotiation with bazaar merchants which adding 10% increment to the bottom line

- Rationalized the product assortment through regular market visits to sharpen regionally relevant assortment

- Designed the annual category strategy which set the market scenario and framework for growth and path to profitability

- Seting up manufacturing hubs that drives company's major topline

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

experience.title: Senior Key Account Manager
experience.description:
As a Key Account Manager (KAM) at Paytm, I focus on driving business growth by managing and strengthening relationships with key clients and partners. My role involves:


‚úÖ Strategic Account Management ‚Äì Handling high-value accounts, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maximizing revenue opportunities.

‚úÖ Business Development ‚Äì Identifying new business prospects, upselling Paytm‚Äôs solutions, and expanding market presence.

‚úÖ Client Relationship Management ‚Äì Acting as a trusted advisor, addressing client needs, and ensuring long-term partnerships.

‚úÖ Sales & Revenue Growth ‚Äì Driving transactions, negotiating deals, and achieving business targets.

‚úÖ Market & Competitor Analysis ‚Äì Staying ahead of trends to offer innovative fintech solutions.


At Paytm, I am committed to enhancing digital payment adoption and delivering seamless financial solutions to businesses.


#KeyAccountManager #Paytm #Sales #BusinessGrowth #Fintech #ClientSuccess
experience.description_html:
As a Key Account Manager (KAM) at Paytm, I focus on driving business growth by managing and strengthening relationships with key clients and partners. My role involves:

✅ Strategic Account Management – Handling high-value accounts, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maximizing revenue opportunities.
✅ Business Development – Identifying new business prospects, upselling Paytm’s solutions, and expanding market presence.
✅ Client Relationship Management – Acting as a trusted advisor, addressing client needs, and ensuring long-term partnerships.
✅ Sales & Revenue Growth – Driving transactions, negotiating deals, and achieving business targets.
✅ Market & Competitor Analysis – Staying ahead of trends to offer innovative fintech solutions.

At Paytm, I am committed to enhancing digital payment adoption and delivering seamless financial solutions to businesses.

#KeyAccountManager #Paytm #Sales #BusinessGrowth #Fintech #ClientSuccess

experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

recommendations: Vijay Inani ‚ÄúI had the privilege of working under Deependra's leadership, and I can confidently say that he is one of the most impactful and charismatic leaders I've ever encountered. Deependra is not just hardworking; he thrives under pressure, effortlessly navigating the most challenging situations with poise and energy. What truly sets him apart is his unwavering commitment to his team. He always made himself available whenever support was needed, taking complete ownership of projects and shielding his people from unnecessary pressures. I was fortunate to have earned his trust, as he gave me complete authority in my role while providing full support at every step. This level of empowerment and trust was something I will always cherish. Deependra possesses a remarkable ability to provide solutions to complex problems, backed by his strong understanding of both Product and Technology. His deep technical knowledge, combined with his hands-on experience, allows him to tackle challenges from multiple angles and deliver effective solutions. He has risen from the ground up, which gives him a unique perspective and makes him an even more empathetic and grounded leader. Deependra's ability to make bold and tough decisions, often under immense pressure, has earned him deep respect across the organization. He maintains a strong and positive rapport with all stakeholders, ensuring alignment and mutual respect in every interaction. His leadership style is both impactful and inspirational, fostering an environment where learning and growth are inevitable. I have learned an incredible amount from Deependra, both professionally and personally. His guidance has been invaluable, and I will always be grateful for the opportunity to work with such an exceptional leader.‚Äù

LinkedIn User ‚ÄúI have worked with Deependra for short period of two months at Paytm. Although it was short, we were working hard on one of the critical projects of the organization which required stretched working hours and busy weekends as well. I must say he is a good leader and works well with the team in planning, designing, and execution of plans. He has sound knowledge of scalability, fault-tolerance, security and other aspects of systems. He always remains calm even, in the harsh conditions, and this character of his brings must needed sanity and positivity in the team. He is a workaholic and always open to having constructive discussions. I strongly recommend him to any organization who is looking for strong technology leader in their company. ‚Äù

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

experience.title: Senior Key Account Manager
experience.description:
As a Key Account Manager (KAM) at Paytm, I focus on driving business growth by managing and strengthening relationships with key clients and partners. My role involves:


‚úÖ Strategic Account Management ‚Äì Handling high-value accounts, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maximizing revenue opportunities.

‚úÖ Business Development ‚Äì Identifying new business prospects, upselling Paytm‚Äôs solutions, and expanding market presence.

‚úÖ Client Relationship Management ‚Äì Acting as a trusted advisor, addressing client needs, and ensuring long-term partnerships.

‚úÖ Sales & Revenue Growth ‚Äì Driving transactions, negotiating deals, and achieving business targets.

‚úÖ Market & Competitor Analysis ‚Äì Staying ahead of trends to offer innovative fintech solutions.


At Paytm, I am committed to enhancing digital payment adoption and delivering seamless financial solutions to businesses.


#KeyAccountManager #Paytm #Sales #BusinessGrowth #Fintech #ClientSuccess
experience.description_html:
As a Key Account Manager (KAM) at Paytm, I focus on driving business growth by managing and strengthening relationships with key clients and partners. My role involves:

✅ Strategic Account Management – Handling high-value accounts, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maximizing revenue opportunities.
✅ Business Development – Identifying new business prospects, upselling Paytm’s solutions, and expanding market presence.
✅ Client Relationship Management – Acting as a trusted advisor, addressing client needs, and ensuring long-term partnerships.
✅ Sales & Revenue Growth – Driving transactions, negotiating deals, and achieving business targets.
✅ Market & Competitor Analysis – Staying ahead of trends to offer innovative fintech solutions.

At Paytm, I am committed to enhancing digital payment adoption and delivering seamless financial solutions to businesses.

#KeyAccountManager #Paytm #Sales #BusinessGrowth #Fintech #ClientSuccess

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
Key Responsibilities


Outdoor Visibility, Branding and organizing promotional campaigns in rural and urban areas

Maintaining the Visibility Merchandising activity on daily basis

Weekly thrice outfield to check the status and opinion of our concern

Preparing daily sales and retention reports as per daily and monthly basis

Preparing auditing reports for other departments

Handling customer complaints and ensured all the queries are closed in SLA

Coordinated with different vendors to ensure the work delivered in time


Key Deliverables


Merchandising

Handling a team of 10-15 Merchandisers who were working under event management agency  for various clusters to deliver the right product at right time

Interfacing with the customers frequently in order to identify specifications for merchandise and offer prices accordingly. And was handling branding for whole Tamilnadu Circle.


Relationship Management

Interacting with Channel Partners for ascertaining requirements, concerns, problems making and delivering need based product solutions.

Coordinating with the Supply chain with the help of Warehouse team and updating the status of customer requirements in order to fulfill their needs on day-to-day / weekly basis.


Significant Highlights:

Successfully ensured that all the customer complaints were closed within SLA with achieving 100% target continuously which has resulted in cost reduction and profit maximization of firms wealth

Efficiently kept the daily records of Warehouse and Vendors for handling inspection and quality issues.

Shruti's exceptional interpersonal skills enabled her to build strong relationships with candidates, ensuring a seamless and positive recruitment experience. Beyond her technical expertise, Shruti's unwavering dedication and enthusiasm significantly boosted team morale and fostered a collaborative work environment. Her capacity to adapt to changing priorities and her keen problem-solving skills made her a go-to resource for both her colleagues and clients. In summary, Shruti's exceptional skills, dedication, and positive attitude make her a valuable asset to any organization. experience.description_html:
As a Key Account Manager (KAM) at Paytm, I focus on driving business growth by managing and strengthening relationships with key clients and partners. My role involves:

✅ Strategic Account Management – Handling high-value accounts, ensuring customer satisfaction, and maximizing revenue opportunities.
✅ Business Development – Identifying new business prospects, upselling Paytm’s solutions, and expanding market presence.
✅ Client Relationship Management – Acting as a trusted advisor, addressing client needs, and ensuring long-term partnerships.
✅ Sales & Revenue Growth – Driving transactions, negotiating deals, and achieving business targets.
✅ Market & Competitor Analysis – Staying ahead of trends to offer innovative fintech solutions.

At Paytm, I am committed to enhancing digital payment adoption and delivering seamless financial solutions to businesses.

#KeyAccountManager #Paytm #Sales #BusinessGrowth #Fintech #ClientSuccess

Beyond her technical expertise, Shruti's unwavering dedication and enthusiasm significantly boosted team morale and fostered a collaborative work environment. Her capacity to adapt to changing priorities and her keen problem-solving skills made her a go-to resource for both her colleagues and clients. In summary, Shruti's exceptional skills, dedication, and positive attitude make her a valuable asset to any organization. I am confident that she will continue to excel and make significant contributions wherever she goes.‚Äù
